recipesJson.name: Castello del Cardinale
recipesJson.author: LonesomeRhodesTN
recipesJson.description: An O.G. match made in Heaven . . . Five Pawn's Castle Long meets Fear's Cardinal.   A smooth blend of caramel, bourbon, toasted coconut/almonds, vanilla, tobacco, and oak.  The blend carries slight notes of coffee and cocoa, as well.  I began this working on a clone of Castle Long and a Cardinal-based custard, when it dawned on me . . . drop the custard and make a Castle Long/Cardinal mash up.  Even though it has not hasn't been around as long . . . Cardinal has far surpassed O.G. status, in my book.  I mix this up 60vg/40pg.  This works great as a SNV, but gets better with age.  Enjoy with a cup of coffee blacker than Old Scratch's heart.
